document.nodeName: Textured modern beach house in Sydney
document.contentSummaryTitle: Textured modern beach house in Sydney
document.contentSummary: Have a look inside a stunning Sydney beach house, made modern by interior architect Andrew Waller with the right use of colour, pattern and texture.
document.pageTitle: Gallery – A Modern Beach House in Sydney
document.pageMetaDescription: Have a look inside a stunning Sydney beach house, made modern by interior architect Andrew Waller with the right use of colour, pattern and texture.
document.contentBody:
[{"type":"paragraph","label":"Paragraph","content":"Colour, pattern and texture are cleverly used by interior architect [Andrew Waller](http://www.mrwaller.com/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank") to turn a 1970s beach house on Sydney's Northern Beaches into a modern classic. 

This four-bedroom home wasn't always so light and inviting – the owners, a couple with two teenage boys, bought the property last year and, back then, the two-storey house lacked flow. Walls sliced up the living spaces and the family had to zigzag through the house to catch water glimpses. 

The challenge was to make the most of the views and introduce the spirit of the sea, yet reflect the home's place near the city. "It had to feel calm and lived-in and more sophisticated than the traditional beach house," says Andrew."},{"type":"paragraph","label":"Paragraph","content":"[Read the full article](http://www.homestolove.com.au/dreamy-modern-beach-house-in-sydney-2091/|target="_blank")

Article from: *Australian House & Garden*
Text: Chris Pearson
Photos: Nicholas Watt"}]
document.contentGallery:
[{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/homes/2015/09/06/2090/MRWALLER_181-LAUDERDALE-FAIRLIGHT-03-03-2015__0019-var_v0.2-(1).jpg","caption":""The entry is an introduction to the whole scheme," says designer Andrew. It's interplay of the textures, patterns, colours and materials used throughout the house. 

**Pendants** and **stool** from [Julie Lewis Agency](http://www.julielewisagency.net/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank"). Flinders **console** from [Globe West](http://www.globewest.com.au/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank"). Framed **tapestry** in Prussian Blue from [Quercus & Co](http://www.quercusandco.com/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank"). Moroccan **basket** and lady palm (*Rhapis excelsa*) **plant** from [Garden Life](http://www.gardenlife.com.au/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank").","title":"","open":false,"mediaType":"image","source":"Australian House and Garden","credits":[],"tags":["food:Room:Other rooms:Entrance","food:Renovating:Trims and fittings:Flooring:Tiled flooring","food:Renovating:Trims and fittings:Exterior finishes:Brick walls","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Lighting:Pendant light","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Accessories and decor:House plants","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Accessories and decor:Baskets and boxes","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Living room furniture:Credenzas","food:Decorating:Style:Coastal/beach","food:Decorating:Style:Contemporary"],"valid":true},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/homes/2015/09/06/2090/MRWALLER_181-LAUDERDALE-FAIRLIGHT-03-03-2015__0067-var_v0.3.jpg","caption":""The kitchen was the starting point for the interiors," says Andrew. "It had to have a relaxed ambience, with the island bench and pantry like stand-alone pieces of furniture." 

Miniforms Lechuck **stools** from [Cafe Culture+Insitu](http://www.cafecultureinsitu.com.au/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank"). **Joinery** by [CMK Joinery](http://www.cmkjoinery.com/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank"). Brasserie **pendants** from [Emac & Lawton](http://www.emac-lawton.com.au/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank"). Island bench and pantry **paint** is [Dulux](http://www.dulux.com.au/|target="_blank") Sage Monica. *Leo* **artwork** by [Craig Ruddy](http://www.craigruddy.com/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank").","title":"","open":false,"mediaType":"image","source":"Australian House and Garden","credits":[],"tags":["food:Room:Kitchen:Kitchens","food:Room:Kitchen:Kitchen island","food:Decorating:Colour:Green:Pale green","food:Decorating:Colour:Blue:Pale blue","food:Decorating:Colour:Pastel:Pastel blue","food:Decorating:Style:Coastal/beach","food:Renovating:Trims and fittings:Joinery"],"valid":true},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/homes/2015/09/06/2090/hg0915-Kitchen-case-study11-var_v0.2.jpg","caption":"Andrew designed an appliance cupboard with bifold doors that allows this busy area to be easily closed off when the family is entertaining, an important consideration when the kitchen is open to social areas.","title":"","open":false,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":["food:Room:Kitchen:Kitchens","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Large appliances:Refrigerators","food:Decorating:Colour:Blue:Pale blue","food:Renovating:Materials:Tiles:Subway tiles","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Kitchen furniture and products:Splashbacks","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Kitchen furniture and products:Bar stools","food:Equipment:Small Appliances:Toasters:Toaster"],"valid":true},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/homes/2015/09/06/2090/hg0915-Kitchen-case-study10-var_v0.2.jpg","caption":"It has a distinctly Scandinavian feel. "With framed doors with routed V-joint style panels, the kitchen employs a spare, functional aesthetic," says Andrew. But it also has a local connection he says, "It's modern-Australian beach style."","title":"","open":false,"mediaType":"image","source":"Australian House and Garden","credits":[],"tags":["food:Decorating:Colour:Blue:Pale blue","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Large appliances:Refrigerators","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Kitchen furniture and products:Bar stools","food:Renovating:Trims and fittings:Joinery","food:Room:Kitchen:Kitchen island","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Kitchen furniture and products:Bar stools","food:Equipment:Small Appliances:Ovens & toasters:Oven"],"valid":true},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/homes/2015/09/06/2090/MRWALLER_181-LAUDERDALE-FAIRLIGHT-03-03-2015__0118-var_v0.1-(1).jpg","caption":"Furnishings in solid oak and ash, including the dining table and chairs, as well as the flooring, have a sun-soaked patina. Simple pencil sketches from Africa hang on the dining room wall. "The woven light fitting over the table is like a tumbleweed. We wanted something very tactile," says Andrew.

Moloko pendant **light** from [MRD Home](http://www.mrdhome.com.au/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank"). Dining **table** from [Globe West](http://www.globewest.com.au/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank"). CH24 Wishbone **chairs** from [Cult](http://www.cultdesign.com.au//?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank"). Europlank engineered-wood **flooring** in Legacy White Extra Rustic Grade from [Havwoods](http://www.havwoods.com.au/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank").","title":"","open":false,"mediaType":"image","source":"Australian House and Garden","credits":[],"tags":["food:Room:Dining:Dining rooms","food:Room:Dining:Casual dining","food:Decorating:Style:Coastal/beach","food:Renovating:Trims and fittings:Glazing/windows:Skylights","food:Decorating:Colour:White","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Lighting:Pendant light","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Accessories and decor:Artwork:Photography","food:Decorating:Style:Contemporary"],"valid":true},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/homes/2015/09/06/2090/MRWALLER_181-LAUDERDALE-FAIRLIGHT-03-03-2015__0043-var_v0.1.jpg","caption":"Pattern plays a key role in the living room, where a potted *Monstera deliciosa* and a bubble-like display of wall-mounted assorted plates explore pattern to add interest to the space. 

Old Yarn **kilim** from [Koskela](http://www.koskela.com.au/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank"). Triangle-print **cushions** in Morph fabric in Prussian Blue from [Quercus & Co](http://www.quercusandco.com/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank"). Oak Tripod **coffee table** and Gus Truss ash **armchairs**, all from [Globe West](http://www.globewest.com.au/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank").","title":"","open":false,"mediaType":"image","source":"Australian House and Garden","credits":[],"tags":["food:Decorating:Colour:Blue:Pale blue","food:Decorating:Colour:Pastel:Pastel blue","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Accessories and decor:Rugs:Kilim rug","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Living room furniture:Coffee tables","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Living room furniture:Sofas and couches","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Living room furniture:Sofas and couches:Armchairs"],"valid":true},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/homes/2015/09/06/2090/MRWALLER_181-LAUDERDALE-FAIRLIGHT-03-03-2015__0423-var_v0.1.jpg","caption":"Easy-care plants forge a link between indoors and out. On the rear terrace, plants with elongated vertical leaves, such as mother-in-law's tongue (*Sansevieria*) and lady palm (*Rhapis excelsa*), have sculptural value. 

Reef **sofa**, **table** and **chairs**, all from [Globe West](http://www.globewest.com.au/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank"). Fitzgerald laser-cut **screen** and **plants**, both from [Garden Life](http://www.gardenlife.com.au/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank").","title":"","open":false,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":["Garden/Outdoor:Outdoor structures:Outdoor room","food:Garden/Outdoor:Plants:Palms","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Outdoor furniture:Planters and pots","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Outdoor furniture:Outdoor seating","food:Decorating:Colour:Blue:Pale blue","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Outdoor furniture:Outdoor cushions","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Outdoor furniture:Outdoor lounge"],"valid":true},{"url":"http://d3lp4xedbqa8a5.cloudfront.net/s3/digital-cougar-assets/homes/2015/09/06/2090/MRWALLER_181-LAUDERDALE-FAIRLIGHT-03-03-2015__0179-var_v0.1.jpg","caption":"Monochrome artworks are subtle in nature so as to not intrude on the delicate palette, such as the *Dance of the In-Between* print by [Craig Ruddy](http://www.craigruddy.com/?utm_campaign=supplier/|target="_blank") above the bed in the main bedroom.","title":"","open":true,"mediaType":"image","source":"","credits":[],"tags":["food:Room:Bedroom:Bedrooms","food:Room:Bedroom:Master bedroom","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Bedroom furniture and decor:Beds:Bedheads","food:Decorating:Colour:Grey:Light grey","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Furniture and fittings by room:Bedroom furniture and decor:Bedside tables","food:Products, Furniture and Fittings:Lighting:Lamps:Table lamps"],"valid":true}]
